contents.item: It may take many voices for people to hear the same message.
If you've got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.
If you can think higher thoughts, you can do higher deeds.
Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
Hard work is vital to success. As long as it's in the right direction!
The sky is the limit only if you have a problem with reaching for the stars.
Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.
You have to focus on the finish line from the starting line.

contents.item: It is in vain to hide a fruitful seed in fertile soil.
Burdened no more is soul for whom life flows through dance like breath.
Live more. Worry less. Do what you love.
contents.owner: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

contents.item: Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.
Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you’ll be able to see farther.
In finding the courage and confidence to escape our cages and shine, we help others do the same.
contents.owner: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

contents.item: Great hopes make everything great possible.
A flower’s beauty is birthed in a seed’s ugly struggles.

To stop oppression, you will first end the tyranny of the oppressors.
A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.

contents.item: Start small and keep going.

contents.item: Caution not spirit, let it roam wild; for in that natural state dance embraces divine frequency.

contents.owner: Germany Kent, You Are What You Tweet: Harness the Power of Twitter to Create a Happier, Healthier Life

contents.item: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
If you didn’t fall down, you would never have learned how to pick yourself up.
contents.owner: Laurie Nadel, Dancing with the Wind: A True Story of Zen in the Art of Windsurfing

contents.item: Stars do not hide from darkness. Roses do not hide from thorns. Diamonds do not hide from pressure.
A leaf has no power to resist when the wind blows, but when life’s storms rage, you do.
When it's possible for you to dream, it's not impossible to achieve.
In meetings philosophy might work,on the field practicality works.
Dont wait for anything that will not wait for you.
Execution is something, but timing is everything.
Freedom was my daring travel companion on the thrilling ride of life.
contents.owner: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

contents.item: Understanding how little we know is crucial to gaining knowledge.
Sometimes we have spent so long in the cage that it feels safer to be trapped inside.
contents.owner: Beth Kempton, Freedom Seeker: Live More. Worry Less. Do What You Love.

contents.item: You're only as good as your last thought of yourself.

I am a Freedom Seeker, willing and able to choose my own path.

contents.item: Telling the truth is less demanding than telling a lie.

contents.item: It is impossible for a star to shine and not get noticed, even in the dark.

contents.item: When you put the hard work in... reward will come out.

contents.item: Masters today, were Starters Yesterday, so begin now.

contents.item: LIFE IS LIKE ELECTRICITY, ANYONE CAN SHOCK YOU

contents.item: A good life is doing what you love as much as you can and doing what you must as much as you should

contents.item: Stars cannot achieve their highest potential without the dark.

There can never be someone greater at being you than you.

Only number 1 is unique, rest is just numbers,fight to be no.1

contents.item: The best advice will come from the person who has no personal interest in the matter.

contents.item: The difference between those that can and those that can’t is attitude.

contents.item: There's no beauty without difference and diversity. Love unconditionally.

contents.item: We often build our lives in a way that shuts out freedom.

contents.item: If you want to change yourself, you have to change your point of view.
